column4: want a pc with no moving parts, if i underclock a modern processor, wonder if i could get away without a fan
assuming my mobo doesnt have a fan on any of its other chipsets, use ssd disks, and i can find a fanless psu, i guess i'd have a silent/no moving parts pc
thought underclocking as much as poss might help counteract
Thomas_Anderson   .. Liquid would be good.. Baby oil or sumit similar.. messy tho if something goes wrong.. believe me,, i know :)
